snippet.title: 1999 Edition NASCAR Racing PC game play. Texas
snippet.description:
For some reason, I think sounds are bit small turn up your volume!
This is Texas from NASCAR Racing 1999 edition of Sierra Sports. It works VERY flawlessly on modern PC. I found the original disk I bought looong time ago. This is 3DFX edition runnin on Windows 7 64bit with dgVoodoo 2. I'm playing with Xbox 360 controller evrything works in analog. Resolution is VGA(640x480). Recorded with Fraps and encoded with Handbrake. Enjoy.

dgVoodoo 2
http://dege.freeweb.hu/
